goal_descEN: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
target_descEN: Support and strengthen the participation of local communities in improving water and sanitation management
indicator_descEN: Proportion of local administrative units with established and operational policies and procedures for participation of local communities in water and sanitation management
seriesDescription: Proportion of countries with clearly defined procedures in law or policy for participation by service users/communities in planning program in rural drinking-water supply (%)
sources: Key indicators of the UN-Water Global Analysis and Assessment of Sanitation and Drinking-Water (GLAAS). For the specific sources by country, refer to http://www.who.int/water_sanitation_health/monitoring/investments/glaas/en/.
